thread.title: Iraq says handed over four women, 27 children suspected of Islamic State ties to Russia: Iraqi local tv

title: Iraq says handed over four women, 27 children suspected of Islamic State ties to Russia: Iraqi local tv
text: World News February 22, 2018 / 9:57 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago Iraq says handed over four women, 27 children suspected of Islamic State ties to Russia: Iraqi local tv Reuters Staff 1 Min Read ERBIL, Iraq (Reuters) - Iraq has handed over to Russia four women and 27 children suspected of having ties to the Islamic State militant group, local television broadcaster Al-Sumaria quoted the foreign ministry as saying on Thursday. “Iraq has returned to Russia 27 children and 4 women who were tricked into joining Daesh,” the ministry spokesman told reporters, using the Arabic acronym for Islamic State. Reporting by Raya Jalabi; Editing by Toby Chopra
